reviews.review_msg: Assignments were fair, long essays (2500 + 3500), a little vague in his expectations, very open approach 2 students, if u have any doubts u simply have 2 see him in office hrs, hard 2 tell if he laughs @ u or w/ u Tries really hard 2 make his students happy, Good lectures, doesnt stick 2 reading schedule so B prepared for anything, loves England

Before taking this class, I read the reviews and decided he checked out-Mistake!This class is one of the worst I have ever taken- very philosophical and far TOO much reading (all of Paradise Lost,Eikon Basilike, Leviathan and several poems) Very dry ex. 2 hr lecture consists of reading through 7 pages of Paraides Lost. Advice- do not waste the time
